newsitem.title: FINLAND: YIT SAYS COMPLETES SHARE ISSUES.
newsitem.headline: YIT SAYS COMPLETES SHARE ISSUES.

text.p: Finnish construction group YIT-Yhtyma Oy (YIT) said in a statement on Wednesday its issues of 700,000 shares to the public and 100,000 shares to its staff had been around 1.5 times oversubscribed.

YIT said earlier that an issue of four million shares to institutions had been 2.5 times oversubscribed and decided to issue a total of 4.08 million shares to insitutions plus the 800,000 shares to the public and personnel.
"Oversubscription in the public offering was over 1.5 times according to preliminary estimates and in the staff issue it was almost 1.5 times," YIT said.
The share issues were discontinued at 1000/0800 GMT on Wednesday, it said.
The price for institutions and the public was 61 markka per share and staff paid 56 markka, YIT said earlier.
